hypothesis_content.title: Low Gas Regime as Leading Indicator for Altcoin Accumulation
hypothesis_content.statement: When Ethereum gas prices remain below the 30th percentile of their 30-day average for 48+ hours during neutral/bull regimes, gas-sensitive altcoins (GRT, CRV, BAT) will outperform BTC by 3%+ over the next 5 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Sustained low gas prices indicate network underutilization, creating favorable conditions for accumulation of utility tokens that benefit from increased on-chain activity. Historically precedes periods of increased DeFi/NFT activity.
entry_conditions: ETH gas price < 30th percentile of 30-day rolling average for 48 consecutive hours
No major protocol upgrades scheduled in next 7 days

exit_conditions.take_profit: 5 days after entry OR altcoin/BTC pair reaches +5%
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Gas price spikes above 70th percentile OR altcoin/BTC pair drops -3%

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Altcoins underperform BTC during sustained low-gas periods in neutral/bull markets
